title: Carlyn Loncaric Unveils AI Underwater Search Tool Revolutionizing Rescue Efforts
description: In a breakthrough for AI Underwater Search, Carlyn Loncaric, a Vancouver native, has unveiled AquaEye—an innovative sonar device designed to revolutionize the search for individuals submerged underwater. Loncaric’s innovative creation serves as a luminous beacon of hope, casting its radiant glow upon the multitude of lives tragically claimed by the annual scourge of drowning. In ... Read more

title: Microsoft Contemplating a Return to the Smartphone Arena with Focus on Personal AI
description: Microsoft’s potential return to the smartphone industry has been the subject of recent discussions, reigniting curiosity about its role in the ever-evolving tech landscape. title: Microsoft Pledges $5 Billion Investment in Australian Tech Sector
description: In a significant move aimed at harnessing the potential of cutting-edge artificial intelligence (AI) and reinforcing cybersecurity, Microsoft has unveiled plans for a substantial $5 billion investment in the Australian tech industry. title: Artists Are Frustrated With Meta’s AI Data Deletion Process, Here’s Why
description: Many creatives are frustrated with Meta’s perceived effort to allow them to request the removal of their personal data and work from being used to train the company’s generative AI models. title: Exclusive Report: How AI’s Analytical Mastery Help With Online Reputation Management
